listID.description: Put the new task in a list ("project"). Omit this param to have the task be private.
listID.title: List ID

dueOn.description: The date on which the task should be due
dueOn.title: Due On

positionUpcoming.description: Determines the sort order when showing tasks grouped by their due_date
positionUpcoming.title: Position Upcoming

parentId.description: If provided, this task will become a subtask of the given task
parentId.title: Parent ID

noteMimeType.description: Identify which markup language is used to format the given note
noteMimeType.title: Note Mime Type

noteContent.description: Provide the content for the task's note
noteContent.title: Note Content

sectionId.description: Specify which section under which to create this task
sectionId.title: Section ID

tags.description: A list of tag names to apply to the new task separated by a comma (,)
tags.title: Tags

startsOn.description: The date on which the task should start
startsOn.title: Starts On

ownerid.description: The ID of the account to whom this task will be assigned
ownerid.title: Owner ID

position.description: Determines the sort order of tasks
position.title: Position

mirrorParentTags.description: Whether this task will be a subtask, and this is true, the parent tasks's tags will be mirrored to this one
mirrorParentTags.title: Mirror Parent Tags

mirrorParentSubscribers.description: Whether this task will be a subtask, and this is true, the parent tasks's subscribers will be mirrored to this one
mirrorParentSubscribers.title: Mirror Parent Subscribers

positionList.description: Determines the sort order when showing tasks in, or grouped by, a list
positionList.title: Position List

createdAfter.description: Select resources created after a certain time
createdAfter.title: Created After

workspaceId.description: Create resources under the given workspace
workspaceId.title: Workspace ID

createdBefore.description: Select resources created before a certain time
createdBefore.title: Created Before

updateBefore.description: Select resources updated before a certain time
updateBefore.title: Update Before

updateAfter.description: Select resources updated after a certain time
updateAfter.title: Update After
